creator: conor@apache.org
text:
Perhaps the directory is different resulting in a slightly different length
string. In any case, the error message number "CS2021" indicates that this error
is being reported by the microsoft CSC compiler. It is not an Ant issue per se.
Can you check the path uses on the Win2K machine?
